rubs.name: Spicy rub
rubs.ingredients: 2tbsp cayenne, 1tbsp dark chili powder, 2tbsp cumin, 1tsp garlic powder, 1tsp onion powder, 1tsp ground cinnamon, 1/2tsp ground cloves
rubs.recipe: mix everything together and rub into meat to be smoked or cooked

rubs.name: rib rub
rubs.ingredients: 2tbsp cayenne, 2tbsp dark chili powder, 1tbsp brown sugar, 2tbsp cumin, 2tbsp ground corriander, 1tbsp ground cinammon, 1tsp allspice
rubs.recipe: mix everything together and rub into meat to be smoked or cooked

rubs.name: savour and sweet
rubs.ingredients: 2 tbsp ground caraway, 1 tbsp ground cumin, 1 tsp chilli flakes, 1 tsp dried parsley, 1 tsp dried tarragon
rubs.recipe: mix everything together and rub into meat to be smoked or cooked

rubs.name: woodsy flavor
rubs.ingredients: 2 tbsp ground cumin, 1 tbsp ground coriander, 1 tsp ground cardamom, 1 tsp ground turmeric
rubs.recipe: mix everything together and rub into meat to be smoked or cooked
